description:
Stay agile on the slopes this season. The S/Max 120 has a thinner shell that brings out your on-snow sensitive side while ramping up your power. Reinforced with carbon framing and an oversized pivot, the result is a light and masterful boot for precise power transfer anywhere on-piste. A new seamless liner adds comfort to bring out your boldest moves and fastest lines.

  • Polyurethane shell with carbon fibre reinforcement transfer power efficiently to your skis
  • Coreframe construction reduces weight and improves sensitivity with a thinner shell
  • Pre-shaped seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for a refined custom fit
  • 4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit
  • 45mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff
  • Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness
  • Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly
  • Narrow width in a 98 mm last
  • Alpine soles
name: Salomon S/Max 120 Ski Boots - Men's
